reporter_caption.center: KEENAN COMPANY v. PAMLICO, INC., 155 Ga. App. 678 (1980)

caption.center: KEENAN COMPANY et al. v. PAMLICO, INC.

opinion.opinion_text:
The prior holding of this court in Keenan Co. v. Pamlico,Inc., 152 Ga. App. 502 (263 S.E.2d 197) (1979), has been reversed on certiorari by the Supreme Court, 245 Ga. 842 (268 S.E.2d 334) (1980). The prior judgment in this case is accordingly vacated, and the judgment of the trial court is reversed.
Judgment reversed. McMurray, P. J., and Sognier, J., concur.
ARGUED SEPTEMBER 26, 1979 â€” DECIDED SEPTEMBER 10, 1980.
opinion.posture: Action for commission. Bibb Superior Court. Before Judge Johnson.Page 679
opinion.attorneys:
H. Jerome Strickland, Hubert C. Lovein, Jr., for appellants.
George C. Grant, for appellee.
